LanguageData.MakeStrawRiceBag_RawRice.label: Make Straw rice bag(rice)
LanguageData.MakeStrawRiceBag_RawRice.description: 300 rice can be stored, and it can be sold as agricultural products./n CAUTION: Because the airtightness is bad, the contents decrease when opening.
LanguageData.MakeStrawRiceBag_RiceMomi.label: Make Straw rice bag(Momi)
LanguageData.MakeStrawRiceBag_RiceMomi.description: 300 Momi can be stored, and it can be sold as agricultural products./n CAUTION: Because the airtightness is bad, the contents decrease when opening.
LanguageData.MakeStrawRiceBag_BrownRice.label: Make Straw rice bag(Brown rice)
LanguageData.MakeStrawRiceBag_BrownRice.description: 300 Brown Rice can be stored, and it can be sold as agricultural products./n CAUTION: Because the airtightness is bad, the contents decrease when opening.
LanguageData.MakeStrawRiceBag_GlutinousRice.label: 米俵(もち米)を作る
LanguageData.MakeStrawRiceBag_GlutinousRice.descripti: もち米を300個保管できて、特産品として高く売れる。\n！！注意！！ 気密性が悪いのでほどく時に中身が減ります。
LanguageData.MakeStrawRiceBag_WhiteRice.label: Make Straw rice bag(White rice)
LanguageData.MakeStrawRiceBag_WhiteRice.description: 300 White rice can be stored, and it can be sold as agricultural products.CAUTION: Because the airtightness is bad, the contents decrease when opening.
LanguageData.UnwindStrawRiceBag_RawRice.label: Открытый рисовой мешок из соломы (рис)
LanguageData.UnwindStrawRiceBag_RawRice.description: 【Предостережение】 Поскольку воздухонепроницаемость плохая, содержимое уменьшается при открытии.
LanguageData.UnwindStrawRiceBag_RiceMomi.label: Open Straw rice bag (Momi)
LanguageData.UnwindStrawRiceBag_RiceMomi.description: CAUTION: Because the airtightness is bad, the contents decrease when opening.
LanguageData.UnwindStrawRiceBag_BrownRice.label: Open Straw rice bag (Brown rice)
LanguageData.UnwindStrawRiceBag_BrownRice.description: CAUTION: Because the airtightness is bad, the contents decrease when opening.
LanguageData.UnwindStrawRiceBag_GlutinousRice.label: 米俵(もち米)をほどく
LanguageData.UnwindStrawRiceBag_GlutinousRice.descrip: 米俵から中身をとりだす。\n気密性が悪いのでほどくさいに中身がこぼれて減っている。
LanguageData.UnwindStrawRiceBag_WhiteRice.label: Open Straw rice bag (White rice)
LanguageData.UnwindStrawRiceBag_WhiteRice.description: CAUTION: Because the airtightness is bad, the contents decrease when opening.
